data: PRIVACY POLICY RELATING TO NESS SMARTLIVING SMARTPHONE APPS
Privacy Policy

SL-Mobile and SL-MobilePlus for iPhone and iPad provides remote management for SmartLiving systems supplied by Ness Corporation. You can remotely control your home and office giving security and home automation commands from your mobile device, at any time and any location.
Our Privacy Policy explains how we use and protect information in relation to services.
1- Necessary Information:
To access the service you are required to provide the following user data for your SmartLiving system:
1. Network Address of the Smartlan Ethernet module (Either G or Si models)
label: collection

data: 2. Port
label: collection

data: 3. Type connector
label: collection

data: 4. User and Password for the Smartlan-G
label: collection

data: 5. User Code
label: collection

data: 2-What we do with the information:
The user data is not stored in any online information systems and is only stored in the mobile device for use by the SL-Mobile and SL-MobilePlus apps.
You are responsible for any activity that occurs through your account and any operation that you make with your SmartLiving system.
You are responsible for the use or misuse of the SL-Mobile and SL-MobilePlus apps and for the operation of your Smartliving system using the apps.
By downloading the app, you accept the conditions of the Privacy Policy.
PRIVACY POLICY RELATING TO NESS UHOO WIRELESS VIDEO INTERCOM
Privacy Policy
UHOO app for iPhone and iPad provides wireless video intercom services . You can remotely view your UHOO intercom system from your mobile device, at any time and any location.
Our Privacy Policy explains how we use and protect information in relation to services.
1- Necessary Information:
To access the service you are required to provide the following user data for access to your UHOO system:
1. Your home router's SSID
label: collection

data: 2. User name and password for the UHOO Cloud Service
label: collection

data: 2-What we do with the information:
The user name, password, still images and video messages are stored in the UHOO Cloud Service.
label: collection

data: You are responsible for the use or misuse of the UHOO app and for the operation of your UHOO system using the apps.
By downloading the app, you accept the conditions of the Privacy Policy.
PRIVACY POLICY RELATING TO 30 DAY CREDIT ACCOUNTS and CASH ACCOUNTS
Your Personal Information
If you choose not to provide personal information, we may not be able to provide you with credit account facilities.
Personal information may include:
Name, address, driver's license number and date of birth;
label: collection

data: The fact that you have applied for credit and the amount of credit applied for;
label: collection

data: The fact that the Company is a current credit provider to you;
label: collection

data: Details of payments overdue more than 60 days and for which collection action has commenced;
label: collection

data: Advice that payments are no longer overdue;
label: collection

data: Details of cheques drawn by you or electronic banking transactions, which have been dishonoured more than once;
label: collection

data: In specified circumstances advice that in the opinion of the Company you have committed a serious credit infringement;
label: collection

data: Advice that credit provided to you by the Company has been paid or discharged.
label: collection

data: Personal information is gathered in many ways including, but not limited to:
Directly from you e.g. when you complete a Credit Application Form;
label: collection

data: From the public domain;
label: collection

data: From third parties such as our related companies, your own representatives (lawyers, accountants etc.) and reporting agencies.
label: collection

data: This information may then be used by us to:
To establish, administer and manage a trading account including billing and collecting debts;
label: collect_purpose

data: Carry out appropriate checks for credit-worthiness and for fraud.
label: collect_purpose

data: For the purposes as set out above we may disclose your personal information to organisations outside the Company including:
Your own representatives (lawyers, accountants, insurers etc.);
label: sharing

data: Credit reporting and fraud checking agents;
label: sharing

data: Other credit providers for credit related purposes such as checking credit-worthiness, credit rating and financing;
label: sharing

data: Our own professional advisers such as lawyers, debt collection services, auditors and accountants;
label: sharing

data: Our related entities;
label: sharing

data: Government or other authorities as required or authorised by law.
label: sharing

data: Right to Access
You have a right to access your personal information, subject to some exceptions allowed by law.
For security reasons we ask that such requests be made in writing addressed to The General Manager, Ness Corporation, 4/167 Prospect Highway, Seven Hills, NSW, 2147.
Data Security
The Company guarantees the storage and use of personal information will be undertaken in a secure manner that protects personal privacy.

While the Company takes all reasonable steps to ensure that the personal information we collect, use and disclose is accurate, complete and up-to-date, the accuracy of that information depends to a large extent on the information you provide.
We recommend that you advise us if there are any errors in your personal information and keep us up-to-date with any changes.
